name: MYTHEORYTE (Luis José Martín Cabrera)
description:
- Welcome to the MyTheoryte -
Our entry to WeeklyGameJam 84 with the theme - ALONE

Dive into the mind of the self through a Platform Shooting Game in a Robot's shoes who just crashed into a space rock.

- Use [A]-[D] or [<-] [->] to move
- Press [W] or [ArrowUp] to Jump
- Press [Spacebar] to Shoot

Carlos Granados 'Charlie' - Art, Design and Prog. - charliebluewood@gmail.com
Luis José Martín - Audio and Design - luizzjoseemart@gmail.com
